MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL68 postcode area of Amlwch, affecting properties in a widespread area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still without power. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a faulty pole termination at Tanybryn substation and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:20PM 16th October 2020
